remarks: Function-builder for derivative: expand the function from an open set to its closure.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvresntr.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
dvresntr.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ S ) $.
dvresntr.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvresntr.j $e |- J = ( K |`t S ) $.
dvresntr.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvresntr.i $e |- ( ph -> ( ( int ` J ) ` X ) = Y ) $.
dvresntr $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D F ) = ( S _D ( F |` Y ) ) ) $.
